verbs.description: An editorial cartoonist for the Pittsburgh Post - Gazette [V: has] been fired . Rob Rogers tells Pittsburgh 's Action News 4 he got the news today . " I had a feeling that it might , but I was sort of hoping for another outcome . I thought maybe they would have a proposal for how we could work together and keep me in the paper , " Rogers said . Rogers says his relationship with the Post - Gazette soured in recent weeks , especially when he says the publisher turned down six consecutive cartoons without reason . Many of the cartoons were critical of President Donald Trump . Rogers says he has had 19 cartoons pulled since a new editorial director took over in March . " It 's kind of weird to be a political cartoonist who 's criticizing Trump , but who 's now kind of famous for getting shut down for criticizing Trump . It 's very odd , because it was very sort of Trumpian in the way it happened to me , " Rogers said . The Pittsburgh Post - Gazette said in a statement today that they do n't " provide details about employment matters , but in light of Mr. Rogers ' public comments today , we do want to acknowledge his long service to the newspaper and our community . Any further discussions will be conducted with Mr. Rogers as a private matter . " Rogers views this as a suppression of his speech that 's been in the Post - Gazette for 25 years . " I am worried that Pittsburgh has less opportunity to see differing opinions on on the editorial page , so that is sad , " Rogers said .

Any further discussions will be conducted with Mr. Rogers as a private matter . " Rogers views this as a suppression of his speech that 's been in the Post - Gazette for 25 years . " I am worried that Pittsburgh has less opportunity to see differing opinions on on the editorial page , so that is sad , " Rogers said .

Rogers says his relationship with the Post - Gazette soured in recent weeks , especially when he says the publisher turned down six consecutive cartoons without reason . Many of the cartoons were critical of President Donald Trump . Rogers says [ARG0: he] has [V: had] [ARG1: 19 cartoons pulled since a new editorial director took over in March] . " It 's kind of weird to be a political cartoonist who 's criticizing Trump , but who 's now kind of famous for getting shut down for criticizing Trump . It 's very odd , because it was very sort of Trumpian in the way it happened to me , " Rogers said . The Pittsburgh Post - Gazette said in a statement today that they do n't " provide details about employment matters , but in light of Mr. Rogers ' public comments today , we do want to acknowledge his long service to the newspaper and our community . Any further discussions will be conducted with Mr. Rogers as a private matter . " Rogers views this as a suppression of his speech that 's been in the Post - Gazette for 25 years . " I am worried that Pittsburgh has less opportunity to see differing opinions on on the editorial page , so that is sad , " Rogers said .

Many of the cartoons were critical of President Donald Trump . Rogers says he has had 19 cartoons pulled since a new editorial director took over in March . " It 's kind of weird to be a political cartoonist who 's criticizing Trump , but who 's now kind of famous for getting shut down for criticizing Trump . It 's very odd , because it was very sort of Trumpian in the way it happened to me , " Rogers said . The Pittsburgh Post - Gazette said in a statement today that they do n't " provide details about employment matters , but in light of Mr. Rogers ' public comments today , we do want to acknowledge his long service to the newspaper and our community . [ARG1: Any further discussions] [ARGM-MOD: will] be [V: conducted] [ARG2: with Mr. Rogers] [ARGM-PRD: as a private matter] . " Rogers views this as a suppression of his speech that 's been in the Post - Gazette for 25 years . " I am worried that Pittsburgh has less opportunity to see differing opinions on on the editorial page , so that is sad , " Rogers said .
